snippet.title: RED METAL Demo Release Date Reveal - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Find out when you can get your hands on the wheel of RED METAL, a vehicle-combat action rogue-lite packed with knuckle-clenching moments and a wide variety of unlockable customisations. Mow down hordes of enemies. Perform insane stunts. Dodge nuclear strikes. Just another day in the Resistance. Fuel up. Fight back.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2741160

#convergenceshow #indiegame
